channel.title: Podcasts
channel.description: I interviewed four different experts in three different areas related to animation - animation cel art, early animation filming techniques and restoration technologies.
channel.itunes:subtitle: I interviewed four different experts in three different areas related to animation - animation cel art, early animation filming techniques and restoration technologies.
channel.itunes:summary: I interviewed four different experts in three different areas related to animation - animation cel art, early animation filming techniques and restoration technologies.

item.title: Stephen Worth
item.description: Stephen is the director of the ASIFA animation archive in Hollywood. He has also worked as a post production supervisor and an animation art conservator.
item.itunes:author: Stephanie Sapienza
item.itunes:subtitle: Stephen is the director of the ASIFA animation archive in Hollywood. He has also worked as a post production supervisor and an animation art conservator.
item.itunes:summary: Stephen is the director of the ASIFA animation archive in Hollywood. He has also worked as a post production supervisor and an animation art conservator.

item.title: Ron Barbagallo
item.description:
Ron Barbagallo is an animation art conservator who works on both corporate and private restoration and conservation projects. Some of his clients include Disney, Warner Brothers, Hanna Barbera, and Roy E. Disney’s personal animation art collection. View his full biography at:
www dot animationartconservation dot com slash biography dot html
